code: import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{openModal,openConfirmModal,closeModal}from'../modules/modal';import{useCallback}from'react';function useModal(){var state=useSelector(function(state){return state.modal;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var onOpenModal=useCallback(function(data){dispatch(openModal(data));},[dispatch]);var onOpenConfirmModal=useCallback(function(data){dispatch(openConfirmModal(data));},[dispatch]);var onCloseModal=useCallback(function(){dispatch(closeModal());},[dispatch]);return{state:state,onOpenModal:onOpenModal,onOpenConfirmModal:onOpenConfirmModal,onCloseModal:onCloseModal};}export default useModal;
